name: Alvorada Das Estações (PedroVMVictor, Yunner, Lima, Lefumis, ErickMarcel)
name_original: Alvorada Das Estações (PedroVMVictor, Yunner, Lima, Lefumis, ErickMarcel)
description: Alvorada das Estações is an adventure game with top-down perspective, roguelike genre elements and pixel art aesthetics. In it, we control a young mage who wants to restore the world after the seasons were imprisoned in a tower by the mysterious mage, Klay-ton.
